IEEE Draft Standard for Intelligent Electronic Devices (IEDs) Cyber Security Capabilities

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard defines the functions and features to be provided in substation intelligent electronic devices (IEDs) to accommodate critical infrastructure protection programs. The standard addresses security regarding the access, operation, configuration, firmware revision and data retrieval from an IED. It does not address communications for the purpose of power system protection (teleprotection).
